description: Complete system overview detailing the multi-agent workspace environment, security architecture, and core component interactions
Detailed documentation of the agent system including the evidence chain, memory graph, council deliberation system, and persona learning algorithms
Comprehensive documentation of the security implementation including tool registry, code execution sandboxing, workspace security, and risk management systems
Technical specification of the two-tier memory architecture, semantic search implementation, vector embeddings, and knowledge persistence mechanisms
Documentation of data flow patterns between components including inter-agent communication, tool execution pipeline, and memory retrieval processes
